title: Launch Button Not Working
body:
Hi,

For the last few months, I have had constant issues with the Launch button not working. I will click it, and it will take up to like 5 minutes to actually respond, I know others have the same problem, but I don't know how to fix it.

I've tried everything suggested on http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1lps3z/if_client_is_not_starting_heres_the_fix_enjoy/

It's getting a little annoying.

Anyone here know of an actually solution?

Sometimes it doesn't launch at all, regardless how long I wait...

replies.body:
This is still happening to me. I tried both the official Instructions and even doing a fresh install of league. Something is conflicting with the launcher and it's not firewall/adobe air/direct x/.Net.

I'm ripping hairs out trying to solve this issue

Hey,

I've not heard of this one before, but if it has been consistent for a few months, I'd definitely try doing a fresh install of League from scratch - [Instructions here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

The reddit post you mentioned also has a few of the steps from our [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) article too, so it might be worth visiting that for some more possible steps.

Cheers
Mindstar
